title: Commit hook enforces test updates
description: When ralph.zsh functions change, tests in test-ralph.zsh must be updated. Add pre-commit hook that fails if ralph.zsh is modified but test-ralph.zsh isn't. Ensures tests stay in sync with implementation.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Create pre-commit hook that checks for test updates
If ralph.zsh modified, require test-ralph.zsh also modified
Hook can be bypassed with --no-verify for emergencies
Hook checks if new functions added without test coverage
List of functions extracted from ralph.zsh
Compare against test functions in test-ralph.zsh
Warn if coverage gap detected (new func, no test)
Add to install-hooks.sh for easy setup
Document in CLAUDE.md the test requirement
